QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Chloride test - blood
QAPair.Answer: Chloride is a type of electrolyte . It works with other electrolytes such as potassium, sodium, and carbon dioxide (CO2). These substances help keep the proper balance of body fluids and maintain the body's acid-base balance. This article is about the laboratory test used to measure the amount of chloride in the fluid portion (serum) of the blood.
